#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;

	while(t--) {
		int x[26];
		int y[26];
		string a, b;
		memset(x, 0 , sizeof(x));
		memset(y ,0 , sizeof(y));
		cin>>a>>b;
		for(int i = 0 ; i < a.length(); i++) {
			x[a[i]-'a']++;
		}
		for(int i = 0 ; i < b.length(); i++) {
			y[b[i] - 'a']++;
		}
		int f = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			if(x[i] != y[i]) {
				f = 1;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(f) cout<<"NO\n";
		else cout<<"YES\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
